text: Bonningues-lès-Ardres is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A village situated 10 miles (16 km) northwest of Saint-Omer, on theD217 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Leger, dating from the sixteenth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * Bonningues-lès-Ardres on the Quid website Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bonningues-lès-Ardres
